front.title: NSIS-PCN : NSIS Extensions for Admission Control over Diffserv using Pre- congestion Notification (PCN)

abstract.t: This document specifies the extensions to the NSIS QoS signalling protocol (QoS-NSLP)[QoS-NSLP] for support of the Controlled Load (CL) service over a DiffServ cloud using Pre-Congestion Notification as defined in [CL-DEPLOY]. The CL-DEPLOY is a QoS architecture similiar to RMD-QOSM measurement-based admission control. This draft is based on [RSVP-PCN] and uses some text from it.
